answers.answer: It depends on your state, doctor, and your insurance. I am in California and also have Tricare and had my last scar (my anatomy scan) at 19 weeks and was told unless I become high risk or something seams off an needs to be checked, then I will not get any more ultrasounds. I am currently 34 + 5 and have not had any after the anatomy scan.
I'm on Medicaid and was only supposed to have two. But my baby was measuring small so since 32 weeks I've gotten like 3 more
I've got 4 ultrasound or sonogram What's the difference? But Yeah I am 40weeks tomorrow and I had 4
Depends on insuance, dr and you and or babys health I've had quite a few done plus I paid for a 3d ultrasound at 31 weeks.
I only got two but since I have complications they have to always monitor me so I'm getting more
I get an ultra sound every week until 24 weeks.
I only had two so far one at 16 weeks to see how far along i was n one at 31 weeks im now 34 + 1 so i probably wont get anymore. I get medicaid.

Im not gettin anymore sono/ultrasound. Had my anotomy scan about 8 weeks ago.. and only get another one if i loose weigh or dont gain anymore weigh.. because im almost 30 weeks and only gained 2pds hole pregnancy.
Ive only had one at 21 weeks
I only get 2. I had one at 9w3d and I don't get another until 20 weeks to find out what my baby is. I have TennCare cause I live in Tennessee,it *****.
I've Had 5 And I'll Be 20 Weeks Tomorrow.
I've Had 5 And I'll Be 20 Weeks Tomorrow.
I have one every two weeks and starting at 26 weeks ill be getting one every week. I'm very high risk though.. but I love seeing my little girl so often :)

I have had 8 so far...I have one every week unt august 4th now because gestational diabetes. I am not happy about gestational diabetes but I love seeing my son and the ultrasound lady always does 3d free for me...she is awesome!
I've had one to confirm i was pregnant, and one to determine the sex. I don't think I get another one :(

Im in az i had one down at 10 weeks 19 weeks and 20 weeks cuz my daughter is stubborn wouldnt show her face for doc and getting ready to have another ultrasound at 28 weeks to check growth of babygirl

I only get one at 6 weeks to determine pregnancy and one for the anatomy scan at 20 weeks.  Im paying for a 3d gender peek in two days but im only 13w4d so my hopes are not high i just want to see the baby and i get a free one at 15 weeks if we do not see the gender. :) due jan 19.
I get an ultrasound every time I go in because my baby is a pain and don't like to be heard it loves to be seen and I'm 17 weeks go in for my anatomy scan next week
I have had four so far and have another next week I also get one every four weeks because I'm so high risk.
Tricare doesn't do many ultrasounds because they think it,affects they baby. I have tricare prime

question: I'm 19 weeks and someone told me that after the anatomy scan I won't get anymore Sonograms, just check ups. I've been getting checked every three weeks, I'm not high risk or anyrhing. I had the anatomy scan about two weeks and a half ago. The baby looked perfect and found out the gender. I'm just wondering how everyone's doctors is. I currently live in Az and have Tricare so I don't know if that makes It a difference.
title: how often does everyone get a sonogram or ultrasound.
